Query
“Create use cases for signup that prevent known issues from recurring”
S

use_cases.title: UC1 - Successful Signup with Verification Email Check
use_cases.goal: Ensure that a user can sign up successfully and receive a verification email with the correct link.
preconditions: Email sending is enabled in the environment
steps: Enter the email and password from the test data.
Check the inbox for the verification email.
expected_results: The verification email contains exactly one verification link pointing to the correct domain and path, and includes a token parameter.

use_cases.title: UC2 - Handling of Service Unavailability During Signup
use_cases.goal: Verify the system's response when the signup service is unavailable due to maintenance.
steps: Attempt to sign up during the maintenance window using valid credentials.
expected_results: Receive a 503 Service Unavailable HTTP status.
Display the message: 'Signup service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.'

use_cases.title: UC3 - Validate Throttling on Resend Verification Email
use_cases.goal: Ensure the system does not spam-send multiple emails when the 'Resend verification' action is repeatedly triggered.
preconditions: User has signed up but not verified their account
expected_results: Throttling is applied, or only the latest email is considered valid.
Clear user feedback is provided about the resend limit.
negative_cases: Rate limit exceeded by more than 5 attempts

assumptions: The documents provided do not specify the detailed UI elements or exact error messages for every scenario, thus generic terms were used.
